properties.description: Legislature intent for sustainable groundwater management
Requirements for forming a Groundwater Sustainability Agency
Powers and authorities granted to GSAs
GSA may require extraction facilities to have meters
GSA authority to regulate groundwater extraction and allocations
GSP must establish sustainability criteria for 6 indicators
GSA enforcement powers for GSP implementation
State Water Board intervention for critically overdrafted basins
